## API Reference

### `ERRORSTR`

Converts an error into a string. Note that this does not include the error toast dialogue, only the literal string representation of the error (e.g. "#N/A").

**Arguments**:
- `error`: An error.

### `THROW`

Throws a #REF! error with a custom message.

**Arguments**:
- `message`: The message to add to the error.
